one idea would be to have a "data-files" folder on same level inside ZN-master folder as "data" and all big optional files over 1MB inside.

Then all user-data like comments, votes, etc. are stored as usual inside "data", and all optional big files become UNIVERSAL.
Inside "data-files" folder, one could use hash of each optional big file as foldername to store file in.

This way searching, handling, voting/blacklisting, comparing files would be much easier?

Any zites could be accessing and using these files then, as they are no longer tied to specific zites or hubs.

Does that make sense for developing a plugin?
